pullrequest.title: Try to detect the gazebo version and install a compatible ogre version

content.raw:
Thanks for the patch Steve. Although parsing manually cmake is not very robust, it should be enough until we find a better way.

I just added a check in 180c049 for improving the error detection on our manual parsing.
content.html:
Thanks for the patch Steve. Although parsing manually cmake is not very robust, it should be enough until we find a better way.

I just added a check in 180c049 for improving the error detection on our manual parsing.
